name: InfiniFly
description:
Inifnifly is my first released game.

The concept is simple and very similar to other games.

Fly on your balloon and collect as many crystals as you can while avoiding the birds trying to make you drop to the ground!

To control the balloon simply press or release the "UP" key on your keyboard.

v1.1.0 released!

  • Improved the generation time of crystals and enemies
  • Less randomly positioned crystals and enemies. Now the player has a bit more room to avoid birds
  • No more overlapping entities

Credits for the art go to myself.

Credits for the fonts used:

Joystix monospace ->  Typodermic Fonts 

Credits for the bgm:

Tricky Trinket -> https://soundcloud.com/kilua-boy
